title: Fluid Mechanics
description: The basic principles of fluid mechanics are introduced and the analysis and design of equipment using these principles is practiced.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHBE 2100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
